mapper.select: SELECT ohrigei.user.name, ohrigei.user.email, ohrigei.user.phone, ohrigei.school_info.school_name, ohrigei.application_type.application_type, ohrigei.application_status.application_status_text FROM ohrigei.delegate left join user on delegate.id = user.id left join `group` on delegate.group_ID = `group`.id left join school_info on ohrigei.group.school_ID = school_info.id left join application_type on delegate.application_type_ID = application_type.id left join application_status on delegate.application_status_ID = application_status.id WHERE ohrigei.delegate.role_ID =#{type}
SELECT school_name, ohrigei.user.name, ohrigei.`group`.group_size from ohrigei.`group`, school_info, ohrigei.user where school_info.id = school_ID and ohrigei.user.id = head_delegate_ID

SELECT ohrigei.user.name, admin.title, ohrigei.committee.committee_name, ohrigei.admin.role_AG, ohrigei.admin.role_AD, ohrigei.admin.role_D, ohrigei.admin.role_F, ohrigei.admin.role_L, ohrigei.admin.role_SG from ohrigei.user, ohrigei.admin, ohrigei.committee where type = 0 and ohrigei.user.id = ohrigei.admin.id and admin.committee_ID = committee.committee_name
SELECT committee.name, seat_width, ohrigei.user.name uname from committee, user where ohrigei.committee.chairman_ID
